What the fuck are you saying...
He actively went into the woods and took the snake...
That's all his fault, then he put it in a pillow case for a week.
Then he tried to kiss it. Again all his fault.

It's a cottonmouth, very venomous. No zoo wants it and it's illegal to own one.
They should have released it to the wild again
